game.name: Hidden Paws
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: It's winter and cats are still outside. Cold and alone. Find them and bring them home. Now includes free Christmas Isles. Enjoy!
game.shortDescriptionEn: It's winter and cats are still outside. Cold and alone. Find them and bring them home. Now includes free Christmas Isles. Enjoy!

reviewHighlights.text: Super cute addicting cat finding game. The controls can be a little weird to get used to but I got the hang of it soon enough.
Cute little game that I really enjoyed over Christmas! The controls did give me a little bit of motion sickness at first but I got used to them after...
